list.description:
這是我第一次製作War thunder 瞄具，希望大家會喜歡
我在X有一個蠻喜歡的作者，我參考他的圖片製作瞄具
這是他的X: https://x.com/shimamuraa11451 大家支持他一下
如果想要另一個版本請聯繫我(如果有我會在8/1回復你們)

This is my first time creating a War Thunder sight. I hope everyone likes it!
There’s an artist on X that I really like, and I used their images as a reference to create my sight.
Here’s their X account: https://x.com/shimamuraa11451 — go check them out and show some support!
If you’d like the other version, feel free to contact me.(If there is any, I’ll get back to you on August 1st.)

Hello again fellas!
My newest and 11th usersight is done and one requested by a good friend of mine (@かがり)

Proud to say this might be my most stylish usersight I've made so far
It was inspired by a design of this really awesome usersight I saw from a while ago made by @EllenMiraMathers. Definitely go check him out here:
link: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1077734/en/


Bonus drawing of the usersight today is Tlipoca from the game Yog-Sothoth's yard.

EN:

So, after a long time, I made a new sight, and this time, it's the hungarian RMI-1 X/H prototype plane from late ww2

Works with all tanks (if you put it in the "all_tanks" folder)

tutorial on how to install:

https://youtu.be/nekHNX2FRDs?t=22

HU:

Szóval, hosszú idő után, itt egy új irányzék, és most az a (Repülő Műszaki Intézet) RMI-1 prototípus repülőgépének a köre van

mindegyik harckocsival működik (ha az "all_tanks" mappába teszed az "UserSights" mappában, ami a config-al egy mappában van)

#hungarian #hungary #wtdraw #rmi #sights #magyar #magyarország #aircra...

#sight #niko #oneshot #alltanks #spotter #pancake
Niko Spotter Sight 2!

This goob is here to help you aim (again)

And also attempting to help with your tunnel vision!

HOW TO INSTALL:

1. Extract the zip file

2. Go to the War Thunder folder and click "User Sights"

3. Make a file and name it "all_tanks"

4. Copy and paste the sight in the "all_tanks" folder

5. Boot up War Thunder and go into "Sight Settings" (options < ground vehicle battle settings)

6. Have fun!

DO NOT GOON TO THIS, OR I'LL BURN YOUR HOUSE DOWN
